遺筆: (いひつ) - writing left by the deceased
遺臭: (いしゅう) - scent (of an animal while hunting)
遺芳: (いほう) - memory or autograph of deceased

遺言証書: (いごんしょうしょ) - testamentary document
遺賢: (いけん) - able men left out of office
遺蹟: (いせき) - historic ruins (remains, relics); archeological site
遺集: (いしゅう) - collection of writings by the deceased
遺香: (いこう) - lingering odor of giver (clothes, etc.) (odour)

遼: (りょう) - Distant , Liao (dinastia, 916-1125 d.C.), Khitan Empire
遼東の豕: (りょうとうのいのこ) - taking pride in something mundane, thinking it is exceptional; Liaodong boar
遽しい: (あわただしい) - busy; hurried; confused; flurried
避けて通れない: (さけてとおれない) - (that) cannot be avoided (e.g. problem); unavoidable
避ける: (sakeru) - to avoid (contato físico com); to avoid (situation) , to avoid (physical contact with); to avoid (situation); to ward off, to avert
避る: (さる) - to leave/to go away; to pass/to elapse; to be distant; to send away/to drive off/to divorce; (after a -masu stem, esp. of a suru verb) ... completely; (去る only) (ant: 来る・きたる・1) last ... (e.g. "last April")
避わす: (かわす) - to dodge; to evade; to avoid; to sidestep
避妊リング: (ひにんリング) - intrauterine device; IUD; contraceptive ring
避妊具: (ひにんぐ) - contraceptive device; birth-control device
避妊法: (ひにんほう) - contraceptive method or measures
避暑: (ひしょ) - summering; going to a summer resort
避難: (hinan) - refugiando-se, encontrando abrigo, evacuação, fuga, buscando um refúgio seguro
避難口: (ひなんぐち) - evacuation door; escape hatch
避難場所: (ひなんばしょ) - evacuation site; exposure; refuge shelter; shelter
避難所: (ひなんじょ) - place of refuge; shelter
避難梯子: (ひなんばしご) - fire escape; fire ladder
避難生活: (ひなんせいかつ) - living in evacuation shelters
避難誘導灯: (ひなんゆうどうとう) - (illuminated) emergency exit signs
避難路: (ひなんろ) - evacuation route; escape route (for evacuees)
邀える: (むかえる) - to go out to meet; to receive/to welcome/to greet/to salute/to hail/to reach/to approach/to enter (a phase, era, etc.); to accept (e.g. as a member of a group or family); to call for/to summon/to invite; to approach (a certain time, a point in one's life, etc.)
邀え撃つ: (むかえうつ) - to ambush; to attack; to assault; to meet the enemy
邁進: (まいしん) - pushing forward (undaunted, bravely); working vigorously towards an aim; struggling on; striving towards
還す: (かえす) - to send (someone) back; to send (someone) home
還る: (かえる) - to return/to come home/to go home/to go back; (of a guest, customer, etc.) to leave; {baseb} to get home/to get to home plate
還俗: (げんぞく) - return to secular life; secularization; secularisation
還元みずあめ: (かんげんみずあめ) - reduced sugar syrup
還元剤: (かんげんざい) - reducing agent; reductant
還元水あめ: (かんげんみずあめ) - reduced sugar syrup

還元酵素阻害剤: (かんげんこうそうそがいざい) - reductase inhibitor
